actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of comprehensive hearing health care services, including provision for hearing amplification devices financed in part by the Federal Government.

summary.text: Provides for coverage of comprehensive hearing health care services under the Medicare program of the Social Security Act, including provision for hearing amplification devices financed in part by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of comprehensive hearing health care services, including provision for hearing amplification devices financed in part by the Federal Government.
